# tiltSprint

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of tiltSprint is to help you manage your tilt sprints.

## Installation

You can install the development version of tiltSprint with:

```r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("maurolepore/tiltSprint")
```

## Example

```{r example}
library(tiltSprint)
```
